00033 /*
00034  *  Function pointer for reading data (part of the data source interface)
00035  *  \param data     The ancillary "helper" data
00036  *  \param buf      The buffer to store the image data
00037  *  \param size     The size (usually numColumns * numBytesPerPixel)
00038  *  \param error    populated on error
00039  */
00040 typedef NITF_BOOL(*NITF_IDATASOURCE_READ) (NITF_DATA *data,
00041         char *buf, size_t size, nitf_Error *error);
00042 
00043 
00044 /*
00045  *  Function pointer for destructing the data structure (part of the data source interface)
00046  *  \param data     The ancillary "helper" data
00047  */
00048 typedef void (*NITF_IDATASOURCE_DESTRUCT) (NITF_DATA *);
00049 
00050 
00051 /*
00052  *  Function pointer for destructing the data structure (part of the data source interface)
00053  *  \param data     The ancillary "helper" data
00054  */
00055 typedef size_t (*NITF_IDATASOURCE_GET_SIZE) (NITF_DATA *);
00056 
00057 
00065 typedef struct _nitf_IDataSource
00066 {
00067     NITF_IDATASOURCE_READ read;
00068     NITF_IDATASOURCE_DESTRUCT destruct;
00069     NITF_IDATASOURCE_GET_SIZE getSize;
00070 }
00071 nitf_IDataSource;
